verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu tāṅra nimantraṇa mānilā
āra dina madhyāhna kari' tāṅra ghare gelā

synonyms: tabe—after this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅra—his; nimantraṇa—invitation; mānilā—accepted; āra dina—the next day; madhyāhna kari'-after finishing His madhyāhna activities (taking bath and murmuring mantras); tāṅra ghare gelā—He went to the house of the Mahārāṣṭrian brāhmaṇa.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu accepted his invitation, and the next day, after finishing His noontime activities, He went to the brāhmaṇa's house.
